ไปยังโลก!
ดูรายงาน
commonLanguage.hindi: रिपोर्ट की जाँच की जा रही है

commonLanguage.thai: ดูรายงาน ({0} / {1})

commonLanguage.french: [b]Les projets de développement de la ville.[/b]
commonLanguage.spanish: [b]Las iniciativas de desarrollo de la ciudad.[/b]
commonLanguage.thai: แผนริเริ่มพัฒนาเมือง
commonLanguage.vietnamese: [b]Các sáng kiến phát triển thị trấn.[/b]

commonLanguage.english: Are you sure you want to quit?
commonLanguage.portuguese: Tem certeza que quer sair do jogo?
commonLanguage.thai: คุณแน่ใจหรือว่าต้องการเลิก
commonLanguage.hindi: क्या आप वाकई छोड़ना चाहते हैं?
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Bạn có chắc chắn muốn thoát không?

commonLanguage.english: Login failed. Log in as a guest.
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 登录失败。 将以访客身份登录。
commonLanguage.chinese: 登入失敗。 用訪客身分登入。
commonLanguage.japanese: ログインに失敗しました。 ゲストとしてログインします。
commonLanguage.french: Échec de la connexion Connectez-vous en tant qu'invité.
commonLanguage.russian: Не удалось войти. Войти в качестве гостя.
commonLanguage.portuguese: Falha ao entrar. Entrando como visitante.
commonLanguage.spanish: Inicio de sesión fallido. Iniciado como invitado.
commonLanguage.thai: ล็อกอินล้มเหลว ล็อกอินเป็นบัญชีชั่วคราว
commonLanguage.hindi: लॉगिन विफल। अतिथि के रूप में लॉग इन करें।
commonLanguage.italian: Accesso non riuscito. Esegui l'accesso come ospite.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Không đăng nhập được. Đăng nhập với tư cách khách.
commonLanguage.turkish: Giriş başarısız. Misafir olarak giriş yap.

commonLanguage.thai: สิ้นสุด
ยกเลิก
ยืนยัน

commonLanguage.english: There is a update file {0}. Would you like to update? (Estimated time {1})
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 发现{0}更新文件。 要更新吗？（估计时间：{1}）
commonLanguage.chinese: 有{0}的更新檔案。 要更新嗎？（預估時間{1}）
commonLanguage.japanese: {0}のアップデートファイルがあります。 アップデートを行いますか？(予想時間{1})
commonLanguage.french: Il y a un fichier de mise à jour {0}. Voulez-vous l'installer ? (Temps estimé : {1})
commonLanguage.russian: Обнаружен файл обновления {0}. Выполнить обновление? (Примерное время {1})
commonLanguage.portuguese: Há um arquivo de atualização de {0}. Deseja atualizar? (Tempo estimado: {1})
commonLanguage.spanish: Hay una actualización {0}. ¿Te gustaría descargarla? (Tiempo estimado: {1})
commonLanguage.thai: มีไฟล์อัพเดท {0} คุณจะอัพเดทหรือไม่ (เวลาที่คาดว่าจะใช้ {1})
commonLanguage.hindi: एक अपडेट फ़ाइल {0} उपलब्ध है। क्या आप अपडेट करना चाहते हैं? (अनुमानित समय {1})
commonLanguage.italian: C'è un file di aggiornamento {0}. Vuoi fare l'aggiornamento? (tempo stimato {1})
commonLanguage.indonesian: Ada file pembaruan {0}. Apa kamu ingin memperbarui? (Perkiraan waktu {1})
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Có tệp cập nhật {0}. Bạn có muốn cập nhật không? (Thời gian dự tính {1})
commonLanguage.turkish: Bir güncelleştirme dosyası mevcut {0}. Güncelleme yapmak ister misiniz? (Tahmini süre {1})

commonLanguage.thai: เพิ่มเนื้อหา
น้อยกว่า 1 นาที
{0} นาที

commonLanguage.korean: 업데이트 파일을 받는 도중 문제가 발생하여 재시작합니다.
commonLanguage.english: Restart the game due to the error occurred during downloading the update
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 更新文件下载过程出错， 将重新开始下载。
commonLanguage.chinese: 取得更新檔案時發生問題， 重新開始。
commonLanguage.japanese: アップデートファイルのダウンロード中 問題が発生したため再起動します。
commonLanguage.french: Une erreur est survenue pendant le téléchargement de la mise à jour. Relancez le jeu.
commonLanguage.russian: Перезапустите, чтобы решить проблему, возникшую во время получения файла обновления.
commonLanguage.portuguese: Reinicie o aplicativo. Houve um erro na atualização.
commonLanguage.german: Starte das Spiel aufgrund eines Fehlers neu, der während des Updatedownloads aufgetreten ist.
commonLanguage.spanish: Ha ocurrido un problema al recibir el archivo de actualización. Se procederá a reiniciar.
commonLanguage.thai: ในขณะที่โหลดไฟล์อัพเดท มีการรีสตาร์ทเพราะเกิดปัญหา
commonLanguage.hindi: अपडेट फ़ाइल प्राप्त करते समय एक समस्या हुई कृपया गेम फिर से शुरू करें।
commonLanguage.italian: Errore durante il download dell'aggiornamento Riavvia il gioco.
commonLanguage.indonesian: Memulai ulang karena terdapat masalah selama pengunduhan pembaruan.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Khởi động lại trò chơi do xảy ra sự cố trong lúc tải xuống bản cập nhật.
commonLanguage.turkish: Güncelleme indirilirken sorun oluştu Oyunu yeniden başlatın.

commonLanguage.english: There is a new version. Go to the store.
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 发现新版本。即将移动至商店。
commonLanguage.japanese: 新しいバージョンがあります。マーケットに移動します。
commonLanguage.french: Nouvelle version disponible Allez à la boutique.
commonLanguage.russian: Обнаружена новая версия. Зайти в магазин.
commonLanguage.portuguese: Nova versão disponível. Vá até a loja.
commonLanguage.german: Es gibt eine neue Version. Gehe jetzt zum Shop.
commonLanguage.spanish: Hay una nueva versión. Ve a la tienda.
commonLanguage.thai: มีเวอร์ชันใหม่แล้ว ไปที่ร้านค้า
commonLanguage.hindi: एक नया वर्ज़न उपलब्ध है। स्टोर पर जाएँ।
commonLanguage.italian: C'è una nuova versione. Vai allo store.
commonLanguage.indonesian: Ada versi baru. Pergi ke toko.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Có phiên bản mới. Hãy truy cập kho ứng dụng.
commonLanguage.turkish: Yeni bir sürüm mevcut. Mağazaya git.

commonLanguage.english: The download of the patch file. ({0:F2}%)
commonLanguage.japanese: パッチファイルをダウンロード中です。({0:F2}%)
commonLanguage.thai: ดาวน์โหลดแพตช์ไฟล์ ({0:F2}%)

commonLanguage.english: Failed to load the server information.
commonLanguage.japanese: サーバー情報の取得に失敗しました。
commonLanguage.french: Échec du chargement des informations serveur
commonLanguage.portuguese: Falha ao carregar informações do servidor.
commonLanguage.spanish: Error al cargar la información del servidor.
commonLanguage.thai: การโหลดข้อมูลเซิร์ฟเวอร์ล้มเหลว
commonLanguage.hindi: सर्वर जानकारी लोड करने में विफल।
commonLanguage.italian: Non è stato possibile caricare le informazioni del server.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Không tải được thông tin máy chủ.

commonLanguage.korean: 1. 저장소 읽기&쓰기 권한 [필수] - 게임 실행 및 기록에 필요한 데이터들을 저장 및 불러오기 위해 필요한 권한입니다.
commonLanguage.english: 1. Storage Read & Write permissions [required] - the data required for game play and record The required permission for Saving and recalling.
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 1.存储读写权限[要求] - 需要游戏和记录的数据 所需的权限，保存和调用。
commonLanguage.chinese: 1.存儲讀寫權限[要求] - 需要遊戲和記錄的數據 所需的權限，保存和調用。
commonLanguage.japanese: 1.ストア読み取り及び書き込み権限[必須] - ゲームの実行と記録に必要なデータを 保存と読み込みのために必要な権限です。
commonLanguage.french: 1. Stockage Lecture et écriture des autorisations [nécessaires] - les données requises pour le jeu et l'enregistrement L'autorisation requise pour l'enregistrement et le rappel.
commonLanguage.russian: 1. Хранение Чтение и Запись разрешений [требуется] - данные, необходимые для игры и записи Требуемое разрешение для сохранения и отзыва.
commonLanguage.portuguese: 1. Armazenamento de leitura e gravação permissões [necessário] - os dados necessários para o jogo e gravar A permissão necessária para Gravação e recuperação.
commonLanguage.german: 1. Lagerung Lesen und Schreibberechtigungen [erforderlich] - die Daten, die für Spiel und Aufzeichnung Die erforderliche Erlaubnis zum Speichern und Abrufen.
commonLanguage.spanish: 1. Almacenamiento de lectura y escritura permisos [requerido] - los datos necesarios para el juego y el registro El permiso necesario para guardar y recuperar.
commonLanguage.thai: 1. การจัดเก็บอ่านและเขียนสิทธิ์ [จำเป็น] - ข้อมูลที่จำเป็นสำหรับการเล่นเกมและการบันทึก ได้รับอนุญาตที่จำเป็นสำหรับการบันทึกและการเรียกคืน
commonLanguage.hindi: 1. भंडारण पढ़ें और लिखें अनुमतियाँ [आवश्यक] - डेटा खेल खेलने के लिए और रिकॉर्ड के लिए आवश्यक सहेजा जा रहा है और याद करने के लिए आवश्यक अनुमति।
commonLanguage.italian: 1. bagagli di lettura e scrittura di autorizzazioni [richiesto] - i dati necessari per il gioco e registrare L'autorizzazione necessaria per salvare e richiamare.
commonLanguage.indonesian: 1. Penyimpanan Baca & Tulis izin [diperlukan] - data yang dibutuhkan untuk bermain game dan merekam izin yang diperlukan untuk Tabungan dan mengingat.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: 1. Lưu trữ Đọc & Viết quyền [cần] - yêu cầu dữ liệu để chơi game và kỷ lục Việc cho phép cần thiết để tiết kiệm và nhớ lại.
commonLanguage.turkish: 1. Depolama Okuma ve Yazma izinleri [gerekli] - Veri oyun ve kayıt için gerekli Tasarruf ve hatırlama için gerekli izni.

commonLanguage.korean: 필수 항목에 동의하지 않으면 게임을 실행할 수 없습니다.
commonLanguage.english: If you do not agree to mandatory You can not run the game.
commonLanguage.chinese_Simple: 如果您不同意强制 你不能运行游戏。
commonLanguage.chinese: 如果您不同意強制 你不能運行遊戲。
commonLanguage.japanese: 必須項目に同意しない場合 ゲームを実行することができません。
commonLanguage.french: Si vous n'êtes pas d'accord obligatoire Vous ne pouvez pas exécuter le jeu.
commonLanguage.russian: Если вы не согласны с обязательным Вы не можете запустить игру.
commonLanguage.portuguese: Se você não concordar com obrigatório Você não pode executar o jogo.
commonLanguage.german: Wenn Sie nicht zustimmen obligatorisch Sie können das Spiel nicht laufen.
commonLanguage.spanish: Si no está de acuerdo con obligatoria No se puede ejecutar el juego.
commonLanguage.thai: ถ้าคุณไม่เห็นด้วยกับการบังคับใช้ คุณไม่สามารถเรียกใช้เกม
commonLanguage.hindi: आप अनिवार्य करने के लिए सहमत नहीं हैं, आप खेल नहीं चल सकता।
commonLanguage.italian: Se non accetti di obbligatoria Non è possibile eseguire il gioco.
commonLanguage.indonesian: Jika Anda tidak setuju untuk wajib Anda tidak dapat menjalankan permainan.
commonLanguage.vietnamese: Nếu bạn không đồng ý để bắt buộc Bạn không thể chạy các trò chơi.
commonLanguage.turkish: Eğer zorunlu kabul etmiyorsanız Bu oyunu çalıştıramazsınız.

commonLanguage.thai: การตั้งค่าสิทธิ์
